price: Zar nisi vidio onoga koji u dokaze Naše ne vjeruje i govori: “Zacijelo će mi biti dato bogatstvo i djeca!”
arabic: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالٗا وَوَلَدًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afara-ayta alladhī kafara biāyātinā waqāla laūtayanna mālan wawaladan
